Type IFakeEngine

Namespace Machine.Fakes

Interface to a fake framework.

Methods

  • PartialMock<T>

Public instance methods

object CreateFake(Type interfaceType)

Creates a fake of the type specified via interfaceType.
Parameters
Type interfaceType

Specifies the interface type to create a fake for.

Return
object

The created fake instance.

T PartialMock<T>(Object[] args)

Creates a partial mock.
Parameters
Object[] args

Specifies the constructor parameters.

Return
T

The created instance.

ICommandOptions SetUpCommandBehaviorFor<TFake>(TFake fake, Expression<Action<TFake>> func)

Configures the behavior of the fake specified by fake.
This method is used for command, e.g. methods returning void.
Parameters
TFake fake

The fake to configure behavior on.

Expression<Action<TFake>> func

Configures the behavior. This must be a void method.

Return
ICommandOptions

A ICommandOptions for further configuration.

IQueryOptions<TReturn> SetUpQueryBehaviorFor<TFake, TReturnValue>(TFake fake, Expression<Func<TFake, TReturnValue>> func)

Configures the behavior of the fake specified by fake.
Parameters
TFake fake

The fake to configure behavior on.

Expression<Func<TFake, TReturnValue>> func

Expression to set up the behavior.

Return
IQueryOptions<TReturn>

A IQueryOptions`1 for further configuration.

IMethodCallOccurance VerifyBehaviorWasExecuted<TFake>(TFake fake, Expression<Action<TFake>> func)

Verifies that the behavior specified by func was executed on the fake specified by fake.
Parameters
TFake fake

Specifies the fake instance.

Expression<Action<TFake>> func

Specifies the behavior that was supposed to happen.

Return
IMethodCallOccurance

A IMethodCallOccurance which can be used to narrow down the expectations to a particular amount of times.

void VerifyBehaviorWasNotExecuted<TFake>(TFake fake, Expression<Action<TFake>> func)

Verifies that the behavior specified by func was not executed on the fake specified by fake.
Parameters
TFake fake

Specifies the fake instance.

Expression<Action<TFake>> func

Specifies the behavior that was not supposed to happen.
